templates.title: Overseerr
templates.description: Overseerr is a free and open source software application for managing requests for your media library.
templates.name: Overseerr

templates.title: qBittorrent
templates.description: The qBittorrent project aims to provide an open-source software alternative to Torrent. qBittorrent is based on the Qt toolkit and libtorrent-rasterbar library.
templates.name: qBittorrent
